title: COD-MW4_update_1.7-=AviaRa=-.exe
description:
NOTES:
		
This version of game is 1.7  ,playable Online on Private (Cracked) servers or Single Player .
On "Join Game" menu (Multiplayer mode) you'll   find on Favorites Tab up to 127 servers v_1.7 
added by me manually ,tested,working.
Just click on "Refresh List" and choose server to play online.
Feel free to add more servers or delete some servers from favorites.
Included  key-generator.
AFTER INSTALL IS DONE ,OPEN GAME ,GO TO   Options - Multiplayer Options - Enter Key Code (Generate a key from key-generator) ,
write key ,press verify ,play game .

If you take ban for no reason from most servers try this :

Open game in multiplayer mode
->   Select Profile -> Delete aviara_ro  -> Create  new profile with your name
->   Options - >Multiplayer  Options -> Player Name    change aviara_ro with your nickname
->   Options  -> Multiplayer Options -> Enter Key Code  -> write a new key from "key-generator"
->   Restart game -> Play on servers from Favorites Tab

How to Fix Iw3mp.exe Error


Method 1: Use Headphones When the Game is Running
Change default audio device to headphones and then play the game.
Plug in a microphone or headphones into the microphone/headphone jack to play the game.

Method 2: Enable Stereo Mix if you have Realtek sound card drivers on Windows Vista computer.
    Open Control Panel.
    Select Hardware and Sound.
    Select Sound and then display the Recording tab in the Sound dialog box.
    Right-click in the window and select the Show Disabled Devices option.
    Enable Stereo Mix.
    Click OK and exit.

http://www.aviara.ro/forum/index.php?topic=11380.msg49827#msg49827" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.aviara.ro/forum/index.php?topic=11380.msg49827#msg49827</a>

If you like this game torrent seed it to others.
Enjoy .
